content: to end of round credits repeat the last two rounds until there are 3 or 4 many thanks to the smart and helpful ladies who sts between the markers your stitch count helped me test knit and tech edit this pattern you when you increased after the brim will determine were invaluable and much appreciated which one it is - page 4 - regina © 2011 carina spencer | www carinaspencer com | not for commercial use
